/.title: Home
/.pagePurpose:
This page will be the main entry point to the site and will need to quickly communicate the core purpose of United Masters.

It will also serve as the primary navigation point to reach other sections of the site.
/.pageContent:
# We are UM

The mission for UM and the key benefit for artists.

## Be your own master

More about how atistst retain their own Masters and keep control

## Start your journey

Information on how to get your music heard and links to the [start of the journey](/begin).

## Learn more

More information [about UM](/about) is available and you can find it at the about page.

/about.title: About
/about.pagePurpose:
This page will give more information about:

- who UM are
- the legal details of UM
- the terms and conditions
/about.pageContent:
# More about UM

More information to make grow confidence

/begin.title: Become your own master
/begin.pagePurpose:
This is where an artist will make contact and make us aware of their music. They will be able to either upload ot link to their content and provide conact details.

The page will also need to establish trust and confidence in the process.
/begin.pageContent:
# Become your own master

We want to hear your music. Upload it or link to it here.

## Link us up

Where can we hear your music

## Upload your demo

Add your demo here for us to hear

## Give us your digits

Let us know how we can reach you

/terms.title: Terms
/terms.pagePurpose: A legal page to communicate the terms and conditions

# The legalese

/thanks.title: Thanks
/thanks.pagePurpose:
Shown to a user following the submission of content, this page should serve as a comfirmation and then provide a lauchcing off point to more information.

Keeping engagement on other channels and retaining contact will be important.
/thanks.pageContent:
# We got you

Thanks for submitting your track. We'll be in touch.
